text: Jausiers (; Vivaro-Alpine: Jausièr) is a commune. It is in the Alpes-de-Haute- Provence department in southeastern France. == Politics and administration == List of Mayors of Jausiers In office Mayor Party Capacity May 1945 Édouard Caire 1980s Jean-Laurent Cogordan March 1989 March 2008 Jean-Pierre Aubert PS Mayor of Barcelonnette (2008-2014) March 2008 May 2020 Lucien Gilly PS General Councillor for the Canton of Barcelonnette (2004-2015) May 2020 Incumbent Jacques Fortoul Retired ==Population== ==Related pages== *Communes of the Alpes-de-Haute-Provence department ==References== Category:Communes in Alpes- de-Haute-Provence
title: Jausiers
